title: The Cave - Stencil w/filter?
content:
It doesn’t seem to match any of the Stencil fonts I have...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thecave_6023.jpg)

 [‹ rounded tech sans Parental ID "Advisory - Gangst"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104259/http:/typophile.com/node/17175 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help please! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104259/http:/typophile.com/node/41207 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cbeatty

comments.content: I think this is [Armalite Rifle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104259/http:/www.dafont.com/armalite-rifle.font?nb_ppp=50&text=THE+CAVE) by Vic Fieger.
I think you are right. If not, it’s very close. Thanks a-mill! I was searching forever for that one!
